skills.name: Search Repository
skills.description: Search text across the repository using git grep or ripgrep and return structured matches.

skills.name: Run Tests
skills.description: Run the project's test suite and return a JSON summary (stdout, exitCode).

skills.name: Run Lint
skills.description: Run project linters (npm run lint or eslint) and return results.

skills.name: Run Unit Tests
skills.description: Run unit tests (prefers npm test with unit filter) and return JSON summary.

skills.name: Run Integration Tests
skills.description: Run integration tests (folder tests/integration) and return JSON summary.

skills.name: NPM Audit
skills.description: Run `npm audit --json` and return the vulnerability report.

skills.name: Deploy Cloud Run
skills.description: Run the repository's deploy script (deploy-cloud-run.sh) and return output.

skills.name: Start Dev Server
skills.description: Start the development server (npm run dev) in background and return PID.

skills.name: Code Quality
skills.description: Run static-analysis tools to find deprecated code, unused deps, cycles and TODOs.
